hymn.title: Christ has become one with sinners
hymn.chords: | C - - | C. C/E. | Dm. G7. | C. F/C. | C. G/B. | Am. C/G. | F. G7. | C - - | C. C/E. | F. Dm. | C/E. Am. | G. G7/B. | C. C/E. | Dm/F. D7/F#. | G. G7. | C F/C/ C. |

layout.singingstanza: Christ has be -- come one with sin -- ners, Shar -- ing in all of our liv -- ing; Cru -- ci -- fied ev -- en for sin -- ners, Glo -- ri -- ous life to us giv -- ing. Christ Je -- sus came for us, Christ Je -- sus died for us; O yes, for us, for us, for us. Christ came and died for us.

lyrics.stanza: Christ has become one with sinners, Sharing in all of our living; Crucified even for sinners, Glorious life to us giving.
Christ Jesus came for us, Christ Jesus died for us; O yes, for us, for us, for us. Christ came and died for us.
